excerpt: "Deep learning is the current darling of AI. Used by behemoths such as Microsoft, Google and Amazon, it leverages artificial neural networks that “learn” through exposure to immense amounts of data. By immense we mean internet-scale amounts — or billions of documents at a minimum."
